Comments_List: It was an incredible learning experience in analytical thinking. We were able to develop insights from deconstructing major topics in diplomacy, macroeconomic policy and sustainable development.
Ambassador Thomas offers an enriching perspective as an experienced diplomat and leader. He was also able to bring in multiple practitioners who gave excellent guest lecturers and discussions.
Absolutely loved this class. I learnt so much and the ambassador is an amazing person to talk to
